entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Caledon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:54 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls late this evening and overnight. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls early in the morning. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
